chooseMove

Move chooseMove(java.util.Collection<Move> legalMoves,
                CheckersGame game)
choose a move from all the legal moves

Parameters:
legalMoves - the collection of possible moves for the indicated state of the board, in no guaranteed order
game - the game being played, including the state of the board
Returns:
the chosen move, never null
